document.docAuthor: Araújo, Marcel Santos De & Feres, Reinaldo José Fazzio
document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the mite (Acari) type specimens deposited at the “ Universidade Estadual Paulista (UNESP), Campus de São José do Rio Preto ”, São Paulo, Brazil (DZSJRP)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the mite (Acari) type specimens deposited at the “ Universidade Estadual Paulista (UNESP), Campus de São José do Rio Preto ”, São Paulo, Brazil (DZSJRP)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype (8947):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , São José do Rio Preto, 20°46’S ; 49°15’W , IV.2003 , ex.
Celtis iguanae (Jacq.) Sarg.
( Ulmaceae ), coll. P.R. Demite.

Holotype (6292):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , São José do Rio Preto, “Sítio São Luiz”, 20º50’S 49º18’W , from
Qualea grandiflora Mart.
( Vochysiaceae ), 26.IV.1990 .

Paratypes (6294–6300):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 3 ♀ , 2 DN, 2 PN, 1 L,
21.VI.1990
; 1 ♀ , “Sítio Santo Antonio”, 20º44’S 49º21’W , 23.VII.1990 ; 1 ♀ , 23.VII.1990 .

Holotype (6282):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , São José do Rio Preto, Sítio Santo Antônio, 20º44’S 49º21’W , from
Qualea grandiflora Mart.
( Vochysiaceae ), 17.IX.1987 .

Paratype (9549–9550):
1 ♀ , Costa Rica , Heredia , Porto Viejo de Sarapiquí, La Selva, from
P . glabratum Kunth
( Piperaceae ),
16. VI .2005
, coll. R. Ochoa.

Paratype (2145):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Pará , Belterra, from a rubber tree,
Hevea brasiliensis Muell. Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ), 9.XIII.1941, coll. J.A. Zilles.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype (10932):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Mato Grosso , Cotriguaçu , 9°51’S , 58°25’W , from Sapindaceae sp.,
16.X.2014
, coll. J.M. Rezende.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratypes (10933–10942):
same data as holotype, 9 ♀
, 3 DN, 3 PN, 1 L.

Holotype (6285):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Paulo de Faria, “ Estação Ecológica de Paulo de Faria”, 19º55’- 19º58’S 49º31’- 49º32’W , from
Sebastiania brasiliensis Spreng
( Euphorbiaceae ), 8.IV.2004 .

Paratypes (6286, 6288–6291):
2 ♀ , 1 ♂ , same data as holotype
;
2 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , São José do Rio Preto , “Sítio São Luiz”, 20º50’S 49º18’W , from unidentified Euphorbiaceae ,
21.VI.1990
.

Holotype (8947):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo State , São João de Iracema, 20°28´S 50°17´W , from
Sterculia striata St. Hil. and Naud.
( Malvaceae ),
III .2008
, coll. P.R. Demite.

Paratypes (8948):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 5 ♀ ,
XII.2007
.

Holotype (10943):
♀ , Brazil , Minas Gerais , São Roque de Minas, from
Protium heptaphyllum
( Burseraceae ), 9.IX.2016 , coll. E.B. Castro.

Paraypes (10944–10954):
same data as holotype, 9 ♀
, 3 DN, 3 PN, 3 L.

Holotype (8935):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo State , Paulo de Faria, “Estação Ecológica de Paulo de Faria”, 19°55´S 49°31´W , from
Alchornea glandulosa Poepp. and Endl
( Euphorbiaceae ), coll. R. Buosi.

Paratypes (8936-8938, 8940–8941):
with same data as holotype with exceptions
, 1 ♀ ,
VI .2003
; 4 ♀ , 2 DN, PN, II.2004 ; 1 ♀ , PN, 2 L, XI.2003 ; 3 ♀ , 1 L, XI.2003 ; 2 ♀ , 1 PN, 1 L,
VI .2003
.
99) Tenuipalpu s toropi Castro, Ramos & Feres, 2015

Holotype (9540):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Paulo de Faria, 19°55’S 49°31’W , from
Sapium glandulatum (Vell.) Pax
( Euphorbiaceae ), IV.2004 , coll. R. Buosi.

Paratypes (9541–9547):
same data as holotype, 7 ♀ , 4 ♂ , pharate ♀ , 3 L, 3 PN, 4 DN
.

Holotype (10138):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Minas Gerais , Itapagipe, 19°52’S 49°39’W , from
Terminalia argentea Mart. & Succ.
( Combretaceae ), 16.X.2008 , coll. A. Mendonça.

Paratypes (10140–10144):
5 ♀ , 3 DN, on same slide as holotype ;
2 ♀ , 3 PN, 3 L,
19.VIII.2014
, coll. E.B. Castro , same data as holotype
;
8 ♀ , DN, same data as holotype
.

Holotype (10158):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, from
Hevea brasiliensis Muell Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ),
21. XII .2000
, coll. T.J. Izzo.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Paratypes (10159–10164):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 5 ♀ , 1 DN, 2 PN, 2 L; 3 ♀ , 1 DN, 1 L, from
Hevea guianensis Aubl.
( Euphorbiaceae ),
VIII.2012
, coll. F.M. Nuvoloni.
